ability: 【C】 All your Characters gets +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Wind：When this card is Triggered, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Character, return it to Hand)

name: 天才ゲーマー兄妹 白
flavor_text: ……うぇぇ、にぃにフラれたぁ……
ability: 【C】During your turn, all your other 「天才ゲーマー兄妹 空」 gets ＋2000 Power.
【A】BOND／「天才ゲーマー兄妹 空」 [①］ （When this card is played onto Stage, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 「天才ゲーマー兄妹 空」 from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand）

name: 異議あり！ 白
flavor_text: ……にぃ、が王様なったら……、ハーレム、作れる
ability: 【C】 SUPPORT All your Characters in front of this card get +500 Power.
【S】［REST this card］ Choose 1 of your 《ゲーム》 Character, until end of opponent's next turn, it gets ＋500 Power.

name: 『　』の片割れ 白
flavor_text: ……盟約に誓って
ability: 【C】If your Stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets ＋1500 Power.

name: 白
flavor_text: ……それ、チート
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, during this turn, this card gets +X Power. X is equals to the number of your 《ゲーム》 Character ×500.
【A】【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if 「戴冠式」 is in your Climax Slot, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a 《ゲーム》 Character, add it to Hand.（If not, return it to its original position)

name: コミュニケーションエラー 白
flavor_text: にぃ！
ability: 【C】The Character facing this card gains 『【A】ENCORE ［Place the top card of your Deck into Clock］』.
【A】When this card becomes REVERSE, place this card to the bottom Deck.

name: 異世界への招待 テト
flavor_text: この世の全てが単純なゲームで決まる。――人の命も、国境線さえも！
ability: 【S】【COUNTER】 ASSIST 3000 Level 2 ［① Place this card from Hand into Waiting Room］ (Choose 1 of your Characters being Front Attacked, during that turn, it gets +3000 Power)

name: 不健全への誘い 白
flavor_text: ……にぃ……、童貞卒業、おめ
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, during this turn, this card gets +X Power. X is equals to the number of your 《ゲーム》 Character ×1000.

name: 国王 白
flavor_text: ……チェスなんて……ただの、マルバツゲーム
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may place the top card of your Clock into Waiting Room.
【A】 When this card attacks, during this turn, this card gets ＋Ｘ Power. Ｘ is equal to the number of your other 《ゲーム》 Character ×1000.
【A】 When this card's dealt Damage is cancelled, during this turn, this card gets ＋2000 Power.

name: 反撃の一手
flavor_text: 空「別に戦わなくたって……勝てる！」
ability: Look at up to 4 cards from your top Deck, choose up to 1 《ゲーム》 Character and show it to opponent, add it to Hand, place the remaining cards into Waiting Room.

name: 戴冠式
flavor_text: 空「生き残るための力を！　強者が手にしたからだ！」
ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Arch：When this card is triggered, choose 1 Climax from your Waiting Room, you may return it to Hand)
